devdoc.author: Enzyme Council <security@enzyme.finance>
devdoc.details: These values should generally only be consumed from off-chain, unless you understand how each release interprets each calculation

returns.denominationAsset_: The denomination asset of the fund
returns.gav_: The GAV quoted in the denomination asset

returns.denominationAsset_: The denomination asset of the fund
returns.grossShareValue_: The gross share value quoted in the denomination asset
The gross share value quoted in _quoteAsset

returns.denominationAsset_: The denomination asset of the fund
returns.nav_: The NAV quoted in the denomination asset

returns.denominationAsset_: The denomination asset of the fund
returns.netShareValue_: The net share value quoted in the denomination asset
The net share value quoted in _quoteAsset

returns.denominationAsset_: The denomination asset of the fund
returns.netValue_: The net value of all shares held by _sharesHolder
The net value of all shares held by _sharesHolder quoted in _quoteAsset

params._fundDeployer: The FundDeployer for which to get the FundValueCalculator address

params._fundValueCalculators: The FundValueCalculator instances corresponding to each instance in _fundDeployers

devdoc.title: FundValueCalculatorRouter Contract

calcGav(address).notice: Calculates the GAV for a given fund

calcGavInAsset(address,address).notice: Calculates the GAV for a given fund, quoted in a given asset

calcGrossShareValue(address).notice: Calculates the gross value of one shares unit (10 ** 18) for a given fund

calcGrossShareValueInAsset(address,addre.notice: Calculates the gross value of one shares unit (10 ** 18) for a given fund, quoted in a given asset

calcNav(address).notice: Calculates the NAV for a given fund

calcNavInAsset(address,address).notice: Calculates the NAV for a given fund, quoted in a given asset

calcNetShareValue(address).notice: Calculates the net value of one shares unit (10 ** 18) for a given fund

calcNetShareValueInAsset(address,address.notice: Calculates the net value of one shares unit (10 ** 18) for a given fund, quoted in a given asset

calcNetValueForSharesHolder(address,addr.notice: Calculates the net value of all shares held by a specified account

calcNetValueForSharesHolderInAsset(addre.notice: Calculates the net value of all shares held by a specified account, quoted in a given asset

getFundValueCalculatorForFundDeployer(ad.notice: Gets the FundValueCalculator address for a given FundDeployer

getFundValueCalculatorForVault(address).notice: Gets the FundValueCalculator instance to use for a given fund

setFundValueCalculators(address[],addres.notice: Sets FundValueCalculator instances for a list of FundDeployer instances

userdoc.notice: A peripheral contract for routing value calculation requests to the correct FundValueCalculator instance for a particular release
